install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa && cd ~ && curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.35.1-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.35.1-stable.tar.xz && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/flutter/bin"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc
